message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $20,000. I think you'll find this a fair price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  To move things along, I could come down to $18,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
